title: Kyubigitsune No Hanayome
alternative_title: The Bride of the Nine-Tailed Fox; 九尾狐の花嫁;
status: The Bride of the Nine-Tailed Fox; 九尾狐の花嫁;
description:
Description :
        Following the legend passed down in his family, Rasen is forced to be the kyubigitsune's bride. Just as Rasen believes that his virginity is about to be taken, the kyubigitsune makes it clear to him that he is actually supposed to be a sacrifice and not a bride?!+
